message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Momentum tilted risk-on with PSU banks, realty, and market infrastructure leading. Strong closes near day-highs in POLICYBZR, PRESTIGE, CDSL, JINDALSTEL, and TATACOMM; FSL showed a wide-range breakout with heavy volume. Chemicals were mixed-to-soft (NAVINFLUOR, DEEPAKNTR), while BEL and KEI saw supply. Our portfolio closed +1.33%, helped by BSE, LAURUSLABS, and INDUSTOWER. No emergency action needed; prefer planned entries on strength or pullbacks Monday.",

    {"symbol": "JINDALSTEL", "signal": "Buy above", "reason": "Metals bid; clean trigger over day high", "price": 1036.5},
    {"symbol": "IRCTC", "signal": "Buy above", "reason": "Tight trend day; continuation over round-number resistance", "price": 725.0},
    {"symbol": "BEL", "signal": "Wait for reclaim", "reason": "Supply near open; avoid adds until it reclaims resistance", "price": 420.0}
